titleStmt.title: The Full and true relation of a dreadful storm or tempest accompanied with thunders, lightnings, and hail-stones, some of them being above two pounds in weight as likewise a terrible earthquake, continuing for above half an hour, giving three furious onsets, the which hapned on the 16th of August 1680, in the city of Millain and the villages adjacent ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
